MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the ML3 postcode area of Hamilton, affecting properties in Low Waters Road and surrounding streets. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 11.56am. Our engineers have arrived on site at the Butterburn substation and are investigating the cause of the fault.  Our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 3.00pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 12.50pm on the 5th of March 2021.
